means: 自我主义，利己主义，自私自利

word_mean: 自我中心，利己主义：牺牲别人寻求自己的利益
合理关心并促进自己的利益
哲学观点，认为个人利益为人类一切行为指导的基础

sentence.Network_en: He was looked down upon because of his egoism.
They seem to love the land and the people with a sort of fierce egoism.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们似乎是带著强烈的利己主义来爱这里的人和土地的.

sentence.Network_en: Joel turned down all offer of help he badly needed because of his excessive egoism.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于极度的自大,乔尔拒绝了所有他极需要的帮助.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from French égoïsme and modern Latin egoismus, from Latin ego 'I'

entry.def: Egoism is the same as egotism .

means.word_mean: 1. attempting to get personal recognition for yourself (especially by unacceptable means)

auth_sentence.content: The promptings of egoism are duly restrained by regard for others.
auth_sentence.res_content: The promptings of egoism are duly restrained by regard for others.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The promptings of egoism are duly restrained by regard for others.

auth_sentence.content: It wasn't selfishness but, rather, a principled egoism.
auth_sentence.res_content: It wasn't selfishness but, rather, a principled egoism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It wasn't selfishness but, rather, a principled egoism.

auth_sentence.content: This has nothing to do with self-estimation, this is pure egoism.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ego自我+centric[adj.中心的]→adj.自我中心的,利己的
ego我,自己+ism主义→n.自私;自负;利己主义

stems_affixes.value_cn: 自我主义者;自私自利的人

ego我,自己+man+ia病,表示疯狂→n.极端利己, 自大狂
